full_text: CaRereeed od K ae IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM Beir 2019/KER/1050 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.SUDHEENDRA KUMAR WEDNESDAY ,THE O9TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 19TH POUSHA, 1940 Crl.MC.No. 177 of 2019 AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN ST 45/2018 of J.M.F.C - II, CHENGANACHERRY CRIME NO. 379/2018 OF CHITTAR POLICE STATION, PATHANAMTHITTA PETITIONER/S: 1 REGI GEORGE, AGED 36 YEARS, S/O.GEORGE, CHAKKALAYIL 340, CHITTAR.P.O., RANNI (NOW WORKING AT MUNSIFFS COURT RANNI, PATHANAMTHITTA DISTRICT. 2 MRS.CINNY REJI, AGED 30 YEARS, W/O.REGI GEORGE, CHAKKALAYIL 340, CHITTAR.P.O., RANNI, PATHANAMTHITTA DISTRICT. BY ADVS. SRI.MANU RAMACHANDRAN SRI .M.KIRANLAL SRI.R.RAJESH (VARKALA) SRI.T.S.SARATH RESPONDENT/S: 1 THE STATE OF KERALA THROUGH THE SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, CHITTAR POLICE STATION, PATHANAMTHITTA DISTRICT, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA-682 031. 2 M/S.CAPITAL STEELS, T B ROAD, CHANGANASSERY, REPRESENTED BY ITS MANAGING PARTNER MR.K H MUHAMMED YUSUF, S/O.HUSSAIN RAWATHER, AGED 47 YEARS, PUZHAVATHUMURI, CHANGANASSERY, KOTTAYAM DISTRICT-686101. OTHER PRESENT: SMT V SREEJA-PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 09.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: DreeO) a [eiseeseee 2019/KER/1050 Cri.MC.No. 177 of 2019 -2- ORDER Dismissed as not pressed. However, the petitioners shall be at liberty to raise all their contentions before the court below at the appropriate stage. The petitioners shall be granted exemption from personal appearance before the court below on all posting dates except when their presence is necessary for the progress of the case, if the petitioners surrender before the court below within 30 days from today and file application in this regard. Sd/- B. SUDHEENDRA KUMAR, JUDGE STK /[TRUE COPY// //P.A. TO JUDGE//
